summary: An ordinance canceling and annulling certain assessments, heretofore levied for the improvement of 4th Avenue and 4th Avenue South; from Union Street to Washington Street; Washington Street form 4th Avenue South to 5th Avenue South; Yesler Way from a point 136.8 feet east of the west line of 3rd Avenue South to 5th Avenue South; Terrace Street from 4th Avenue to 5th Avenue; Jefferson Street, James Street, Cherry Street, Columbia Street, Marion Street and Madison Street, each from 3rd Avenue to 7th Avenue; 5th Avenue from Seneca Street to Madison Street; and 6th Avenue from University Street to Madison Street; all in the City of Seattle under Ordinance No. 14784 creating Local Improvement District No. 1310.
